tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loyalty_memberships (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    member_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    member_phone VARCHAR(15),
    membership_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    points_balance INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program_memberships (
    membership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    join_date DATE,
    loyalty_points INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE member_rewards (
    reward_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    membership_id UUID,
    reward_description TEXT,
    reward_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (membership_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_memberships(membership_id)
);

CREATE TABLE member_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    membership_id UUID,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (membership_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_memberships(membership_id)
);

CREATE TABLE members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LoyaltyProgramMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email_address VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    join_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_points INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE MemberTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES LoyaltyProgramMembers(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BenefitRedemptions (
    redemption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    benefit_id INT NOT NULL,
    redemption_date DATE NOT NULL,
    redeemed_points INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES LoyaltyProgramMembers(member_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (benefit_id) REFERENCES MemberBenefits(benefit_id)
);
